description_for_human: Send gifts to loved ones in Zambia - groceries, medicine, hardware - delivered by local riders with ZRA tax compliance.
description_for_model: KithLy is a Global Gifting Protocol for Zambia. Use this to search for products, calculate prices in GBP/USD, and initiate gift deliveries to cities like Lusaka, Kitwe, and Ndola. All transactions are ZRA tax-compliant. Key endpoints: /search-gifts for product discovery, /pricing/calculate for currency conversion with fees.

search_gifts.description: Search for giftable products by natural language query

calculate_price.description: Calculate final price with all fees in GBP or USD

ai_instructions.description: Get rules of engagement for AI agents
